data.localdb

Class H2ContextBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.localdb.H2ContextBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArtDbContext

    public abstract class H2ContextBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      H2ContextBase(java.lang.String filePath, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      This constructor initializes a new H2 database context to the given database file using to given login credentials.

    • Constructor Detail

      • H2ContextBase

        public H2ContextBase(java.lang.String filePath,
                     java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        This constructor initializes a new H2 database context to the given database file using to given login credentials.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the H2 database file path (file system automatically appends '.mv.db')
        username - the username for login
        password - the password for login
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

    • Method Detail

      • createNewDatabase

        protected abstract void createNewDatabase()
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        This method create a new database file with the desired database schema.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getAnnotatedClasses

        protected abstract java.util.List<java.lang.Class> getAnnotatedClasses()
        This method gets the data entity classes of the context that are applied to the session factory.
        Returns:
        a list of classes that match a database table (marked by @Entity annotation)

      • openSession

        protected org.hibernate.Session openSession()

      • changeUser

        @Deprecated
protected void changeUser(java.lang.String username,
                                       java.lang.String password)
        Deprecated. 
        Apply new user credentials to the session factory to create connections for the new user.
        Parameters:
        username - new username of the sessions created by the session factory
        password - new password of the sessions created by the session factory

      • queryDataset

        public <T> java.util.List<T> queryDataset(java.lang.String sql)
        This method opens a new database session, executes a sql query with given sql and returns the results of the query as java.util.List.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the inner type of the result set (implicitly set)
        Parameters:
        sql - the sql query text that is executed by the query
        Returns:
        a list of DAO entity objects from the result set of the query (on error the list = null)

      • insertRecord

        public <T> void insertRecord(T record)
        This method inserts a DAO into database. Therefore a new session and transaction is created. On error the changes are rolled back.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the DAO (implicitly set)
        Parameters:
        record - the DAO to be inserted into database

      • updateRecord

        public <T> void updateRecord(T record)
        This method updates an existing DAO in database. Therefore a new session and transaction is created. On error the changes are rolled back.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the DAO (implicitly set)
        Parameters:
        record - the DAO to be updated

      • deleteRecord

        public <T> void deleteRecord(T record)
        This method deletes an existing DAO in database. Therefore a new session and transaction is created. On error the changes are rolled back.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the DAO (implicitly set)
        Parameters:
        record - the DAO to be deleted

      • executeScript

        public void executeScript(java.lang.String resourcePath)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        This method executes a sql script. Therefore it gets all statement from the script and executes them in one transaction.
        Parameters:
        resourcePath - the file path of the script resource to be executed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - caused by file errors while reading the script or while executing the sql commands

      • close

        public void close()
        This method implements the Closable interface. It disposes the session factory instance.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
